0.2.name: wordpress/japansoc-voting-button-for-blogs
0.2.description:
This plugins allows your readers to easily submit your blog posts to (JapanSoc.com)[http://www.japansoc.com], a social bookmarking website for everything Japan-related, and then automatically shows how many votes, or socs, your article has received from other JapanSoc'ers.

Usage:

  • Insert either "<!--japansocleft-->" or "<!--japansocright-->" (without quotes) into your posts where you want the button to appear using the HTML editor.
  • Alternatively, you can use the HTML editor buttons labeled JSoc-L and JSoc-R

Notes:

  1. This feature won't work in the Rich Text Editor. You have to use the HTML editor.

    • The difference between 0.2 and the previous 0.1 version of this plugin is the left/right alignment option directly in your post. The tag "<!--japansoc-->" used in version 0.1 still works and defaults to the left.
    • V.3 uses a different url t
